verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
VERSE:
I am free,
Every sin has been erased
By the power of Your grace
I am healed,
Every sickness and disease
Has no hold on me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
PRE CHORUS:
'Cause I believe
Yes I believe

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
Hallelujah,
You said it's done, death is overcome
Hallelujah,
You washed me clean and now I'm free

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
VERSE 2:
I am blessed,
O' my cup it overflows
Beyond all that I can hold
I am saved,
By the power of Your name
I will never be the same

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
PRE CHORUS:
'Cause I believe
Yes I believe

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
Hallelujah,
You said it's done, death is overcome
Hallelujah,
You washed me clean and now I'm free

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
BRIDGE:
With just one touch
Every burden fell off my shoulders
With just one touch
Every mountain swept away
Now goodbye guilt and shame
He's overcome the grave
We lift the name of Jesus higher

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
coda:
We lift the name of Jesus higher
We lift the name of Jesus higher
